item.title: Spring Cloud Config Auto Refresh + Custom Kafka topic
item.description: Spring Cloud Config Auto Refresh + Custom Kafka topic Spring Cloud Config is one of the best features that Spring provides as part of the framework. Spring Cloud Config allows your java application to follow Externalized configuration pattern which is must have if you are building microservices. Additionally, you can also enable the automatic config refresh in Spring Cloud Config so that all your components receive the latest configuration values when there is a change in the configuration.
